Detailed Description

Displays Logger output to a window.

Note
Can be styled with stylesheet

virtual const char* rev::View::ConsoleTool::namespaceName ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

◆ foregroundColorDebug

QColor rev::View::ConsoleTool::foregroundColorDebug
readwrite

Color of Debug text.

This value can be styled via QStyleSheet as follows:

rev--View--ConsoleTool {qproperty-foregroundColorDebug: yellow;}
